alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 11 at 3:57AM MDT until April 14 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TUESDAY TO NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 15 inches, highest amounts most likely near and along the North Dakota border. Most of the snow will fall late tonight through early Wednesday. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will produce blizzard conditions at times, with the strongest winds expected on Wednesday. * WHERE...Harding County and Perkins County. * WHEN...From 3 AM Tuesday to noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
